Html:
Hi!

Have any method to create a simple grid just sending a single array?

Just transform a array to excel file.

 

Ty.

You can basically just use row and column counts and loop through the cells for a sheet:

for($j=1; $j < $rowcount; $j++) {
    for($i=0; $i < $colcount; $i++) {
        $data = $rows[$j][$i]; // array
        $objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->setCellValueByColumnAndRow($i, $j+1, $data);
    }
}
